mapper.select: select r.review_no, pro.product_no, m.id, r.score, r.comment, r.registeredDate from review r join product pro on r.product_no = pro.product_no join member m on r.member_no = m.member_no where pro.product_no = #{productNo}
mapper.insert: insert into review(product_no, member_no, score, comment) values(#{productNo},#{member.number},#{score},#{comment})
mapper.select: select r.review_no, pro.product_no, m.id, r.score, r.comment, r.registeredDate from review r join product pro on r.product_no = pro.product_no join member m on r.member_no = m.member_no where r.review_no = #{no}

select r.review_no, pro.product_no, m.id, r.score, r.comment, r.registeredDate from review r join product pro on r.product_no = pro.product_no join member m on r.member_no = m.member_no where pro.product_no = #{productNo} and m.id = #{id};

select r.review_no, pro.product_no, pro.name, m.id, r.score, r.comment, r.registeredDate from review r join product pro on r.product_no = pro.product_no join member m on r.member_no = m.member_no where m.id = #{id};
select avg(score) from review where product_no=#{productNo} group by product_no;
